>>39229108

“Without an Aetheric Resonator, Dorian can't work with lightning. And neither can I.” Aelriss says, folding her arms and glancing over at the other artificer. “The comb is probably some accessory crafting material... but it doesn't look cheap.”

“Then we'll decidde who gets it when everyone's back.” Kainzo says. “Fair?”

“I suppose.” Donnel says. “What's in the chest?”

> Inventory [[ footlocker ]]
obsidian spike x4

Opening it reveals a number of perfectly smooth, polygonal obsidian spikes, each filed down to a point. They're black, featureless, and clean; you can see your reflection on one of the faces.

“Holy... what are these?” Nel asks.

“Materials.” Kainzo responds. “Probably, anyway, unless someone knows something I don't. I guess we could go ahead and wait for Andor and Vyx...”

What will you do?
> write-in
